title: Open, rigorous and reproducible research: A practitioner’s handbook (2021)
dot:
digraph ResearchOpenness{node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#f9f9f9", fontcolor="#333"]; mainIdea[label="Increasing Benefits of Research
Through Openness, Transparency, and Reproducibility" shape=ellipse fillcolor="#e0f7fa"]; limitations[label="Limitations of Non-Open Research" shape=rect fillcolor="#ffccbc"];limitation1[label="Limited Access to Research Output" shape=rect];limitation2[label="Complex Analyses Lack Detail" shape=rect];limitation3[label="Challenges in Reproduction" shape=rect];limitation4[label="Limits Exploration & Generalization" shape=rect];limitation5[label="Erroneous Findings" shape=rect];limitation6[label="Delays in Genuine Advances" shape=rect];reasons[label="Reasons for Lack of Openness" shape=rect fillcolor="#ffccbc"];reason1[label="Additional Work Required" shape=rect];reason2[label="Legitimate Data Sharing Concerns" shape=rect];reason3[label="Fear of Exposure/Ridicule" shape=rect];reason4[label="Lack of Knowledge on Where to Start" shape=rect];sections[label="Sections of the Handbook" shape=rect fillcolor="#c8e6c9"];section1[label="Section 1: Careful Study Design" shape=rect];section2[label="Section 2: Best Practices in Data Analysis" shape=rect];section3[label="Section 3: Making Research Materials Available" shape=rect];section1_components[label="Components of Section 1" shape=rect];section2_components[label="Components of Section 2" shape=rect];section3_components[label="Components of Section 3" shape=rect];mainIdea->limitations;mainIdea->reasons;mainIdea->sections;limitations->limitation1;limitations->limitation2;limitations->limitation3;limitations->limitation4;limitations->limitation5;limitations->limitation6;reasons->reason1;reasons->reason2;reasons->reason3;reasons->reason4;sections->section1;sections->section2;sections->section3;section1->section1_components;section2->section2_components;section3->section3_components;section1_components->"Experimental Parameters
(Estimation, Pre-Analysis Planning, etc.)";section1_components->"Ethical Considerations";section2_components->"Statistical Analysis Plan

title: 37, the median value for the second prime factor of an integer
dot: digraph{node[shape=box];"Math StackExchange Post"->"OP's Answer (Those Fascinating Numbers)"->"Preface Fact (37 as median of second prime factor)"->"Verify with Sage Code"->"Key Idea from Paper"->"Compute Density (λ₂(p))"->"Find Prime p* (where sum of densities ≈ 1/2)"->"Prove 37 is Median Second Prime";"Compute Density (λ₂(p))"->"Exercise: λₖ(p)";"Find Prime p* (where sum of densities ≈ 1/2)"->"Exercise: Median Third Prime";"Find Prime p* (where sum of densities ≈ 1/2)"->"Hard Exercise: Asymptotics of Median kth Prime";}
